channel.title: PHOTOSONIC ORCHESTRA Podcast
channel.description: Videos, FREE mp3s, ringtones and more from the visual music band 'Photosonic Orchestra'. Founded in Tokyo by VJ / music producer Julyo and DJ Vika, featuring Reece Wardrop, Martyna 'Moyra Noise' Halas and Steven Conroy.

channel.itunes:author: PHOTOSONIC ORCHESTRA

item.title: Drink Me! [ Official Video ]
item.description: The official video for Photosonic Orchestra's new single 'DRiNK ME!' - out now. Buy it now: IRELAND _ Text music 6238 to 57501 to add download to your account. Texts cost €1 UK _ Mobile downloads may incur additional charges. Check with your operator. Texts cost £1. iTunes | Amazon | HMV | Rhapsody coming soon .... -------------------------- DRiNK ME! ( 2010 ) Directed by Bob Gallagher & Séamus Hanly Music by Giulio "Julyo" D'Agostino, Reece Wardrop and Steven Conroy Lyrics by Martyna Halas Mastered by Jamey Staub ( Perimeter Studios, NYC ) Lyrics: I can't help but fall for the sparkle in your eyes Curiosity in the corner of your smile Your perfume tells me stories of a certain night Will you leave your fingerprints on my skin tonight? I am a sip of wine you're so desperate to try Drink me before sunrise, before I change my mind We're of the same species, we're of the same kind It's not where I belong but that's what makes it right All I know about you is that you'd like to play Aside are put our feelings, aside is put my name I am a sip of wine you're so desperate to try Drink me before sunrise, before I change my mind Will I regret the sparkle I've just seen? Will I forget the sweetest taste of guilt? You are a sip of wine I'm so desperate to try Let me drink you now before I change my mind
item.dc:creator: PHOTOSONIC ORCHESTRA
item.itunes:summary:
The official video for Photosonic Orchestra's new single 'DRiNK ME!' - out now.
Buy it now:
IRELAND _ Text music 6238 to 57501 to add download to your account. Texts cost €1
UK _ Mobile downloads may incur additional charges. Check with your operator. Texts cost £1.
iTunes | Amazon | HMV | Rhapsody coming soon ....
--------------------------
DRiNK ME! ( 2010 )
Directed by Bob Gallagher & Séamus Hanly
Music by Giulio "Julyo" D'Agostino, Reece Wardrop and Steven Conroy Lyrics by Martyna Halas
Mastered by Jamey Staub ( Perimeter Studios, NYC )
Lyrics:
I can't help but fall for the sparkle in your eyes Curiosity in the corner of your smile Your perfume tells me stories of a certain night Will you leave your fingerprints on my skin tonight?
I am a sip of wine you're so desperate to try Drink me before sunrise, before I change my mind
We're of the same species, we're of the same kind It's not where I belong but that's what makes it right All I know about you is that you'd like to play Aside are put our feelings, aside is put my name
I am a sip of wine you're so desperate to try Drink me before sunrise, before I change my mind
Will I regret the sparkle I've just seen? Will I forget the sweetest taste of guilt? You are a sip of wine I'm so desperate to try Let me drink you now before I change my mind

item.title: ANAGLYPH album full preview | Photosonic Orchestra | 专辑的完整预览免费下载
item.description: Album Name / Anaglyph Artrist / PHOTOSONIC ORCHESTRA Release Date / 2010 Record label / Elec Trip Records (EMI) Tracks list /   1. Prelude                                                           2. Infinite in Infinity                                         3. Evening                                                          4. You Make me Laugh                                   5. PerAmy                                                           6. Nocturne (feat. Robotnik)                             7. Blue Moon   Featuring /    Vika, Julyo, Robotnik, Martyna Halas, Antonello d'Orazio               ANAGLYPH  preview the whole record at : http://soundcloud.com/photosonic_orchestra/anaglyph-promo Anaglyph images are used to provide a stereoscopic 3D effect, when viewed with 2 color glasses (each lens a chromatically opposite color, usually red and blue).  The record features studio versions of the music performed live during the band 3D DJ/VJ shows, the Photosonic Orchestra live shows uses a strong visual element in conjunction with 'anaglyph movies'. The record sound is a dark melodic combination of classical and jazz influenced compositions, futuristic synthesizers in the style of Vangelis and Jean Michel Jarre, and contemporary dance beats. 记录功能的音乐工作室演出的版本，在乐队的3D Đ /南军所示，Photosonic乐团现场直播节目中使用与'一起强烈的视觉元素'立体电影。 记录声音是一个黑暗的古典音乐和爵士乐的影响成分旋律结合，未来合成器的范吉利斯和让雅尔风格，当代舞蹈节奏。
item.dc:creator: PHOTOSONIC ORCHESTRA
item.itunes:summary:
Album Name / Anaglyph Artrist / PHOTOSONIC ORCHESTRA Release Date / 2010 Record label / Elec Trip Records (EMI) Tracks list / 1. Prelude 2. Infinite in Infinity 3. Evening 4. You Make me Laugh 5. PerAmy 6. Nocturne (feat. Robotnik) 7. Blue Moon Featuring / Vika, Julyo, Robotnik, Martyna Halas, Antonello d'Orazio
ANAGLYPH preview the whole record at : http://soundcloud.com/photosonic_orchestra/anaglyph-promo
Anaglyph images are used to provide a stereoscopic 3D effect, when viewed with 2 color glasses (each lens a chromatically opposite color, usually red and blue). The record features studio versions of the music performed live during the band 3D DJ/VJ shows, the Photosonic Orchestra live shows uses a strong visual element in conjunction with 'anaglyph movies'. The record sound is a dark melodic combination of classical and jazz influenced compositions, futuristic synthesizers in the style of Vangelis and Jean Michel Jarre, and contemporary dance beats.
记录功能的音乐工作室演出的版本，在乐队的3D Đ /南军所示，Photosonic乐团现场直播节目中使用与'一起强烈的视觉元素'立体电影。 记录声音是一个黑暗的古典音乐和爵士乐的影响成分旋律结合，未来合成器的范吉利斯和让雅尔风格，当代舞蹈节奏。

item.title: JUMA-Sidewinder [Photosonic Orchestra RMX ]
item.description:
JUMA-Sidewinder + remix's by DublinXpressRecordings

 

Artist: Juma

Label: Dublin Xpress Recordings

Release name: Sidewinder

File under: Minimal/ Minimal

Release date: 23-02-2010

Press release:

Juma is Owen Johnston, one of Northern Ireland's leading new DJs and Producers. Inspired by people like Jean Michele Jarre, Kraftwerk, Michael Jackson, Ferry Corsten, Paul Van Dyk and Ulster's own X-Ray, Owen has been developing his sound that encompass Trance, Progressive and Minimal. Like other DXR artists Brian Taaffe Owen Johnston fuses Minimal and Trance with aplomb and dare we claim credit but creates Nu Minimal Trance.
Sidewinder is a deep, dark track from Owen aka Juma and shows off his studio skills and dance floor acumen, however, the remixes are simply irresistible.
The Photosonic Orchestra and Nachklangmusik offer two of the best tunes ever on DXR and DXR's very own JR drops a bobshell of an abstract almost beatless version that all adds up to 4 cracking track release.

Track: 1 - Juma - Sidewinder (The Photosonic Orchestra's Intense Mix)
Track: 2 - Juma - Sidewinder (Nachklangmusik's Remix)
Track: 3 - Juma - Sidewinder (Jay Riordan's Beatless in Ballymun Mix)
Track: 4 - Juma - Sidewinder (Original)

Catalogue Code: DXR049
Barcode: 8717578194940
item.dc:creator: PHOTOSONIC ORCHESTRA
